name: Seasonal Ride(Game jam) by Lizzemea&Moses25
description:
This game is about riding a trail made of Nature's cycle of seasons starting from Summer and ending at Spring. Works on Windows 10 and shouldn't need a buff computer to play. Due to using game maker 8 lite in making the game there are some watermarks which shouldn't hurt play.

Made by Lizzemea/Lizzem&Moses25
